SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions ( id, transaction_date, item_name, amount, type, memo, category_id ) VALUES ( trans_seq.NEXTVAL, #{transactionDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{itemName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: UPDATE transactions SET transaction_date = #{transactionDate, jdbcType=DATE}, item_name = #{itemName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, type = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId, jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN type = '수입' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) as "income", SUM(CASE WHEN type = '지출' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) as "expense", COUNT(*) as "totalCount" FROM transactions WHERE TO_CHAR(transaction_date, 'YYYY-MM') = #{month}
SELECT category_id as categoryId, type, SUM(amount) as totalAmount, COUNT(id) as transactionCount FROM transactions WHERE category_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY category_id, type ORDER BY totalAmount DESC
